introduction: This video provides an introduction to the fundamentals of computer graphics, focusing on the technical aspects of the field. It covers the components of computer graphics, including modeling, rendering, and viewing. The video also discusses the framework for interacting with graphics, including input and output devices, graphic systems, application programs, and application models.

sections.title: Section 1: Introduction to Computer Graphics
content: Explanation of computer graphics and its purpose
Discussion of the different components of computer graphics
Overview of the framework for interacting with graphics

sections.title: Section 2: Modeling in Computer Graphics
content: Explanation of modeling in computer graphics
Discussion of different modeling techniques and software
Presentation of real-world applications of computer graphics modeling

sections.title: Section 3: Rendering in Computer Graphics
content: Explanation of rendering in computer graphics
Discussion of different rendering techniques and software
Presentation of real-world applications of computer graphics rendering

sections.title: Section 4: Viewing in Computer Graphics
content: Explanation of viewing in computer graphics
Discussion of different viewing techniques and devices
Presentation of real-world applications of computer graphics viewing

sections.title: Section 5: Interacting with Graphics Frameworks
content: Explanation of the framework for interacting with graphics
Discussion of input and output devices
Presentation of real-world applications of interacting with graphics frameworks
